meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>previous</kanji> <kanji>approximate</kanji> was the previous approximate time, which is <vocabulary>recently</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>the other day</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the kun'yomi vocab readings of the two kanji. That's 先 and 頃 (the reading you learned) put together. The 頃 is the rendaku'd version, ごろ so be careful.
